Monsters.name: Slime
Monsters.description: An oozing creature that eats many an unwary traveler after stunning them with pseudopodic fists.

Monsters.name: Goblin
Monsters.description: A classic monster with beady eyes, a huge nose, and large ears.

Monsters.name: Orc
Monsters.description: A classic piglike moster with pointed ears and a snout.

Monsters.name: Merchant
Monsters.description: A jolly fellow who is willing to part with goods for a little coin
